Reviews.Title: “If you're traveling on a budget this is the place for you!”
Reviews.Author: Tamar S
Reviews.Content: 10 min walk train station location friendly district loaded supermarkets pubs female staff friendly ready time extra bed closet private bathroomshower clean comfortable youre traveling budget staying bbs leonardo hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, good rooms, staff could be kinder”
Reviews.Author: LiorCohen
Reviews.Content: venice bound easy travel foot sense youd flowing city instead walking head buried map hotel quality proximity train station 10 minute walk thats carrying luggage hotel welcomed nice lady pretty clean 2star hotel tips regarding stay friendly helpful value stay

Reviews.Title: “so-so”
Reviews.Author: Dagaz11
Reviews.Content: seen times location perfect close train 1 bridge cross severely crowded farmers market street breakfast poor booking hotel hotelscom despite assurance card wont charged hotels staff charged money warning created issues theres restaurant windows loud late night

Reviews.Title: “Nice small clean might be better after small update”
Reviews.Author: Konstruktorka
Reviews.Content: nice hotel clean bit close vaporetto market real venice buzzing saturdays market starts staff nice helpful especially spanish lady suprise breakfast coffe roll jam eat comfy

Reviews.Title: “Great Venice”

Reviews.Content: lot research booking hotel read reviews decided stay excelent choice easy piazzale roma neighborhood lots shops restaurants half nice triple standard italian breakfast staff nice

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: kiddino
Reviews.Content: hotel wasnt difficult actually walking distance trainbus stations left bit desired dead bugs smashed ceilings water leak spots ceiling shower wasnt store soaps shampoos fresh towels provided daily found random hairs bed day im actually cleaned pros location pretty people nice helpful cons dingy gross service decent checkout day left told ahead time check front desk padlock inside door basically locked cell phone call main check asleep told call wake check inconvenience overall werent thrilled stay wouldnt stay recommend look someplace else stay venice

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous location shame about the accomodation!!”
Reviews.Author: NishaO
Reviews.Content: hotel centrally located easy short distance train station 20 minute walk san marco sq basic clean hot water poorly maintained live wires hanging plug sockets situated ground floor noisy people walked past wouldnt stay dont value money staff pleasant helpful

Reviews.Title: “great location but its not the best place you stay”

Reviews.Content: hotel situated close central location donâ€™t expect fancy simple basic clean looking shower sleep leave luggage suitable staff polite willing help

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel for the Price!!”
Reviews.Author: StefSparks
Reviews.Content: hotel staff extremely friendly hotel located close train station stayed nights total night stayed main hotel third night moved annex single beds annex extremely nice nicer main hotel five minute walk 100 euros night beat accommodations hotel doesnt provide internet paces couple internet cafes

Reviews.Title: “NOT IMPRESSED!!!!!”

Reviews.Content: 15 days venice chose hotel close train station venice maze didnt waste time hotel morning left baggage storeroom left sites told officially checkin late afternoonearly evening staff told hadnt checked staying night ill told moved sister hotel antica walk walk bridges stairs night suitcases day walking venice accompanied owners son helpful pleasant person help luggage morningwe didnt expect venice complicated change plans morning original hotel checkout time extended 11am provided breakfast rude told check earlier ready tour found rude empathy situation caused unprofessionalism unimpressed sister hotel antica clean roomy conclude please stay

Reviews.Title: “Cool little hotel with good staff and great location”
Reviews.Author: GrahamRS
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed hotel leonardo 4 nights january pros location near main pedestrian walkway friendly helpful staff character staff makes delicious beverages morning secure bag storage cleaned daily cons internet access buy door signal bunch moths lived ground floor lots noise spitting yes spitting wierd beds werent super comfortable breakfast consists 2 buns cherry apricot jam overall enjoyed hotel quaint character staff location fine didnt spend lot time venice amazing prepared deal internet situation website available dont stay ground floor super loud single beds pushed comfortable recommend cool fun cheap hotel venice main island doubt

Reviews.Content: hotel yes tiny yes private bathroom shower tube venice dont stay hotel short walk train station dont carry bags staff helpful friendly hotel location main street quiet able lots moderately priced restaurants inexpensive gift shops air fruit market supermarket short walk locals tourists relaxing wonderful espresso bar tourist stops 5 minute walk hotel breakfast found cup coffee stale roll pat butter traveling italy weeks skimpy breakfasts easy inexpensive food italy watching budget excellent stay venice

Reviews.Title: “Great value -- so friendly!”
Reviews.Author: EnglishProfessor8
Reviews.Content: loved staying absolutely found staff incredibly friendly helpful accommodations fancy bed comfortable clean bathroomshower hallway water pressure couple extra items promptly provided location beat 5 min walk vaporettos grand canal walkable luggage wheels piazalle roma people complaining breakfast idiots step outside yourself espresso pastry euros restaurants close try da osteria da francesca excellent local cuisine superb service mille grazie hotel leonardo memorable experience
